trans-unit.source: The method by which costs are distributed.

seg-source.mrk: The method by which costs are distributed.

trans-unit.source: The distribution method is either <uicontrol>Percentage</uicontrol> or <uicontrol>Equivalence</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: The distribution method is either <uicontrol>Percentage</uicontrol> or <uicontrol>Equivalence</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: 付替方法は、<uicontrol>パーセント</uicontrol>または<uicontrol>等価</uicontrol>のいずれかです。

trans-unit.source: Percentage rules distribute costs to the receivers according to the percentages listed in the table under <uicontrol>Posting Rule</uicontrol>.

seg-source.mrk: Percentage rules distribute costs to the receivers according to the percentages listed in the table under <uicontrol>Posting Rule</uicontrol>.

target.mrk: パーセントルールでは、<uicontrol>転記ルール</uicontrol>のテーブルに一覧表示されているパーセントに従って、原価がレシーバに付け替えられます。

trans-unit.source: The equivalence method distributes costs to receivers in proportion to the equivalence numbers.

seg-source.mrk: The equivalence method distributes costs to receivers in proportion to the equivalence numbers.

target.mrk: 等価法では、等価係数に比例して原価がレシーバに付け替えられます。

trans-unit.source: For example, if you want to settle an order to three different cost centers, and you select the equivalence numbers 1, 2, 4, then the costs are distributed as follows:

seg-source.mrk: For example, if you want to settle an order to three different cost centers, and you select the equivalence numbers 1, 2, 4, then the costs are distributed as follows:

target.mrk: たとえば、指図を 3 つの異なる原価センタに決済する場合、等価係数 1、2、4 を選択すると、原価は以下のように付け替えられます。

trans-unit.source: The first cost center receives 1/7 of the costs

seg-source.mrk: The first cost center receives 1/7 of the costs

target.mrk: 最初の原価センタは原価の 1/7 を受け取ります。

trans-unit.source: The second cost center receives 2/7 of the costs

seg-source.mrk: The second cost center receives 2/7 of the costs

target.mrk: 2 番目の原価センタは原価の 2/7 を受け取ります。

trans-unit.source: The third cost center receives 4/7 of the costs

seg-source.mrk: The third cost center receives 4/7 of the costs

target.mrk: 3 番目の原価センタは原価の 4/7 を受け取ります。

trans-unit.source: Whichever method is not used will always show zero values in the table.

seg-source.mrk: Whichever method is not used will always show zero values in the table.

target.mrk: どの方法も使用しない場合でも、常にテーブルにゼロ値が表示されます。

trans-unit.source: In some cases, receivers have a <uicontrol>Special Distribution Method</uicontrol> instead of the standard percentage or equivalence method. Special methods include Product Cost Collector Delivery Value, and Fixed Price Co-Product Amount Settlement.

seg-source.mrk: In some cases, receivers have a <uicontrol>Special Distribution Method</uicontrol> instead of the standard percentage or equivalence method.
Special methods include Product Cost Collector Delivery Value, and Fixed Price Co-Product Amount Settlement.

target.mrk: 一部のケースでは、レシーバに標準パーセントまたは等価法の代わりに<uicontrol>特別付替方法</uicontrol>が含まれます。
特別方法には、製品原価コレクタ納入金額、固定価格連産品金額決済が含まれます。
